batchYeasts.description:
This yeast is best used in Extra Special Bitters and Pale Ales as well as other British styles.
Vacuum packed in foil for freshness.
Each 12 g sachet is suitable for up to 23 litres of wort.
Best fermented between 18-22 C for medium attenuation, this will leave some body in the finished product.
Attenuation 66-74%
Ingredients: Yeast, emulsifier (E491).
batchYeasts.name: Classic English Ale

recipe.notes: Malt is ordered with standard crush @ The Malt Miller (https://www.themaltmiller.co.uk/).
recipe.author: The Thirsty Otter
recipe.name: 04 SMaSH Fuggle

mash.name: NL Hoofddorp Rein Tap Water (2020-Q1 WQR)

total.name: NL Hoofddorp Rein Tap Water (2020-Q1 WQR)

source.name: NL Hoofddorp Rein Tap Water (2020-Q1 WQR)

sparge.name: NL Hoofddorp Rein Tap Water (2020-Q1 WQR)

recipe.teaser: Single malt and single hops British Golden Ale with Extra Pale Maris Otter malt and Fuggle hops.

yeasts.name: Classic English Ale
yeasts.description:
This yeast is best used in Extra Special Bitters and Pale Ales as well as other British styles.
Vacuum packed in foil for freshness.
Each 12 g sachet is suitable for up to 23 litres of wort.
Best fermented between 18-22 C for medium attenuation, this will leave some body in the finished product.
Attenuation 66-74%
Ingredients: Yeast, emulsifier (E491).

name: Batch

boilSteps.name: Irish Moss, Lallemand Servomyces, Wort Chiller

batchNotes:
23-10-2020
Prepared 4 L pre-boiled water.

Brew day
24-10-2020 11:30 added:
3L pre-boiled mash water.
1.2 mL Lactic acid.
0.3 mL Calciumchloride.
0.56 g Epsom salt.
Measure strike water pH = < 5.2 @ 25 C.

24-10-2020 12:00 mash in @ 68.9 C.
lump hunting and stirring.
24-10-2020 12:15 Mash pH = 5.5 @ 60 C.
24-10-2020 13:17 first wort SG = 1.063 @ 42.5 C --> 1.070 @ 20 C.
Sparged with 3.6 L @ 65 C.
SG = 1.030 @ 44.5 C --> 1.038 @ 20 C.
Collected of wort: 5.6 L.
Added 1.3 L @ 40 C for a 2nd sparge. 
SG = 1.025 @ 44.3 C --> 1.033 @ 20 C.
Collected wort: 6.9 L.
Added another 0.45 L water for a pre-boil gravity of 1.031.
Collected wort: 7.35 L pre-boil volume.

Added hops for hopstand @ 82 C.
End of hopstand @ 75.0 C.

Post-boil SG = 1.039 @ 27.8 C --> OG = 1.041 @ 20 C.

24-10-2020 17:07 @ 22.7 C.

Fermentation

Day 0 in fermentation
24-10-2020 18:24 @ 21.7 C pitched 5 grams yeast.
24-10-2020 20:15 @ 21.7 C, dp = 0.01 mm H2O.
24-10-2020 21:58 @ 21.7 C., dp = 0.01 mm H2O.
24-10-2020 23:26 @ 20.4 C, dp = 30 mm H2O, fermentation has started, few bubbles.

Day 1 in fermentation
